member.name: M:Logger.API.Controllers.ErrorLogsController.LogErrors(Microservices.Common.Models.ErrorLogs)
member.summary: This method is used to log exceptions that arise in server side.

member.name: M:Logger.API.Controllers.ErrorLogsController.LogErrors(System.Object)
member.summary: This method is used to log exceptions that arise in Client Side.

member.name: M:Logger.API.Controllers.ErrorLogsController.LogInDatabaseUsingSerilog(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to insert excetions in Database using Serilog. These exceptions include server side and Client Side exceptions.
member.param: Which specfic employee faced the problem.
To check whether the exception was client side or server side. If server side then which Microservice.
